availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Harvey B. Hughes (Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer and private (U.S.A.))

body.p: Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Lewis Hughes and Elizabeth A. Hughes. Married to Ann F. Johnson Hughes in Hickman County, Kentucky, on November 16, 1860. Father of Elisa S. Hughes and Rosa N. Hughes. Farmer in Hickman County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Hickman County in 1860. Farmer in Hickman County in 1863. Served in the 21st Kentucky Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private from 1864 to 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, p. 38B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Hays, p. 535.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Hays, p. 443A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994039, Hickman County Marriages, p. 299.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 1203.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Hickman County, KY, June 1863.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers Who Served in Organizations From the State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 0339.
